The Champ de Mars is a large public greenspace in Paris, France, located in the 
seventh arrondissement, between the Eiffel Tower to the northwest and the cole 
Militaire to the southeast. The park is named after the Campus Martius ("Mars 
Field") in Rome, a tribute to the Latin name of the Roman God of war. ... Originally
